Author: princess-kitty-belle
Text: It's okay that your body has changed, you've just grown a human inside you and it's been through a lot. Easier said than done, but your most important priority now should be looking after yourself so you can bond with bub.

Author: mrsnoire
Text: If you start exercising before your doctor's recommendations, all you can expect is to require a longer recovery time for your internal wounds to heal. If you alter the normal healing process, the only thing you can expect is the abnormal repair of  tissue (formation of fibrosis, bumps, alteration in the local drainage of edema)  Do you really think it's worth it?
